description: Home or small office cleaning priced by home size/tier, with optional deep-clean uplift.
questions: Is this a standard clean or deep clean?
operator_guidance: Select the closest tier based on bedrooms/bathrooms and square footage; round up for cluttered homes.
Apply the deep_clean_uplift_pct if the client requests a deep clean or the home is heavily soiled.
Present a single flat price to the client that covers labor, cleaning products, and basic equipment.
